catList: Introduction to 2-D linear system theory and 2-D Fourier transforms; fundamentals of physical optics and diffraction theory,  Fourier optics, imaging properties of optical systems; introduction to optical signal processing; optical interferometer methods and optical sensing devices and technology including fiber optic interferometric sensors and optical gyroscopes including signal processing methods both in hardware and software; digital imaging methods, including 3D image formation and holography; 3D display technologies.
